column4: I have laptop "Asus 1215N (NVIDIA ION)" with "Ubuntu 11.04". By default, "nouveau" in "3D". Then I install Nvidia, unfortunately after I get only a black screen. It succeeds in "nouveau" to get back but only in "2D". How do I get "3D" werkent again?
Boot up in terminal and do a sudo apt-get remove nividiaProgram you installed?
there should be an option when you boot up to get to a terminal
